trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There was one other sighting in Indianapolis on or around October 20th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsat approximately 10:36 PM on Saturday, October 21,2012, my husband and I were looking for our hotel to the north of Indianapolis, IN, when we came upon 8-10 orange floating spheres that floated in and out of various formations before flying southwest and out of our view.
Summary: while looking for our hotel, we came across 8-10 orange balls which mingled with each other in various shapes before leaving together
